title: Update DNS Record for a Customer
description: A business customer needs to update the A record for their domain, which is hosted on the telecom's DNS servers.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's identity and their authority to make DNS changes.
Get the domain name, record type (A), and new IP address from the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly gathers the required DNS information.

tasks.description: Update the DNS record in the DNS management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the A record.
